name: .CRYPT14 File Extension
summary: Learn about .CRYPT14 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: After you retrieve both your WhatsApp encryption key and your CRYPT14 file, you can decrypt, view, and save your WhatsApp message history using WhatsApp Viewer (Windows), a free WhatsApp database decryption tool.

You can also use a CRYPT14 file to migrate or restore your WhatsApp message history on an Android device. To do so, you must rename your most recent CRYPT14 file to msgstore.db.crypt14, delete and reinstall WhatsApp, and then follow the app's prompts to manually restore your message history. For more detailed instructions from WhatsApp, click here.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
